title: 450dsa.com
description: 450 DSA cracker is a comprehensive list of 400 + topic wise questions to build your confidence in data structure and algorithms and prepare yourself for next job.

title: HotCorners
description: HotCorners is a utility software that allow users to set events to the 4 corners of the screen, This events are automatically triggered when mouse/cursors move into those corners

title: FirePad
description: FirePad is just another text editor that believes faster text editing without being away from keyboard aka AFK.

title: Linkpad
description: Linkpad is a chrome extension to manage your link's all from one place. In short its a URL manager that stores url for faster access in future by the user

title: Auto-Case
description: it converts lower case â†” upper case based on the shortcut pressed, by just selecting the word so you don't have to retype the whole thing again

title: BeRude
description: A fun tool that lists all users who don't follow you back on GitHub. Clicking on the username will redirect you to the person profile , where you can unfollow

title: Time Spent
description: A fun little web app that tells you the total time you lived on earth in all the time formats

title: Coolors
description: A color pallet selection website with tons of features,animations and customization options.

title: Endless Maze
description: browser based game that generates Maze on the fly with never ending levels and incresed complexity in each level
